shortdesc.ph: Gets the detailed video frame information of the video capture device under the specified video format.
Gets detailed video frame information for a video capture device under a specified video format.
Gets detailed video frame information for the specified video format of the video capture device.

p.codeblock: Future<VideoFormat> getCapability( {required String deviceIdUTF8, required int deviceCapabilityNumber});
public abstract int GetCapability(string deviceIdUTF8, uint deviceCapabilityNumber, out VideoFormat capability);

section.p: After calling to get the number of supported video formats of the video capture device, you can call this method to get the detailed video frame information supported by the specified index.
After calling to get the number of supported video formats for a video capture device, you can call this method to get detailed video frame information for the specified index.
After calling to get the number of video formats supported by the video capture device, you can call this method to get the specific video frame information for the specified index.
section.note: This method is only applicable to Windows and macOS.
This method is applicable to Windows and macOS only.
